title: NetBeauty2: Make Your .NET Project Output Directory Neater
description: In .NET projects, increased complexity often leads to more dll files, causing cluttered output directories. NetBeauty2, an open-source project, helps developers organize by moving .NET runtime and dependencies to a designated folder during project release, resulting in a cleaner output directory.

title: Avalonia UI: A .NET Cross-Platform Client Framework
description: A cross-platform UI framework based on WPF XAML supporting various OSes (Windows (.NET Core), Linux (GTK), MacOS, Android, iOS), and Web (WebAssembly).

title: Support Status of .NET across Different Operating Systems
description: By using virtual machines and test machines, this post examines .NET support for various OS versions. After installing each OS, successful installation and execution of StarDust proxy indicates compatibility.
